Create a custom candle holder: You can make a unique candle holder by repurposing an old mason jar or glass container. Add a personal touch by painting the jar with your favorite colors or adding a ribbon or sticker with your name or initials.

Use essential oils: Instead of traditional candles, you can use essential oils to create a relaxing and calming atmosphere in your workspace. Essential oils like lavender, peppermint, and lemon can help boost productivity and reduce stress.
Make your own candle: You can create your own candles by melting wax and adding your favorite scents. You can also add glitter or other decorations to make them even more special.
Use a candle as a desk lamp: If you don't have enough desk space, you can use a candle as a desk lamp. Simply place it on a flat surface and turn it on to create a warm and inviting atmosphere.

Use a candle as a focal point: If you have a blank wall or a dull corner in your workspace, you can use a candle as a focal point. Place it on a pedestal or a tray and add some decorative elements around it to create a cozy and inviting atmosphere.
